name: Flying Police Car 3D Driver – Reckless Chasing of Mafia Gangster Auto
name_original: Flying Police Car 3D Driver – Reckless Chasing of Mafia Gangster Auto
description:
Drive and fly a flying police car to chase Robbers and Criminals. With Free Flying Police Car Simulator get the thrilling cop car driving experience! Test your airplane pilot skills and cop car driving ability at the same time. Fly your plane around the San Andreas city crime to chase down criminals and bank robbers, Do air stunts and drifts as police car driver.
Chase Futuristic criminal flying car as a real cop driver, flying police cars rather than driving in San Andreas or Miami city for chasing mafia dons and criminals. Stop the attack by the Enemy mafia gang. Be a great flying car pilot, turn on siren and lock on target, Press button to launch missile, bombard and takedown criminals.

Enjoy the flying police car simulator and be the topnotch legendary cop Hero for the World in the
Flying Police Car 3D.

Have the best police airplane flight experience!
